name: The Sausage Story
description:
The Sausage Story!

A cute little 2D platformer where you must reach the grill in order to cook the sausage!

Features:
  • 14 Unique levels to play in!
  • Cute art style!
  • A lot of different traps!
  • A mix of easy and hard levels!
Controls:
  • A & D to move.
  • W to jump.
  • ESC to go to the menu.
Support:

Join our Discord server to report bugs & request features! https://discord.gg/BZEYC6CWyk
